# Spells (Alphabetical List - U)
## Uk-Uo
**[[Umber Tentacles (Spell)|Umber Tentacles]]****:** Tentacles attack all creatures within a 20-ft. spread; dealing 2d6+4 damage with each successful hit.

**[[Umbral Hand (Spell)|Umbral Hand]]****:** Medium hand blocks opponents or carries items.

**Unadulterated Loathing:** Target is compelled to avoid another creature.

**[[Unbearable Brightness (Spell)|Unbearable Brightness]]****:** Your glowing body dazzles or blinds others.

**[[Unbind Chakra (Spell)|Unbind Chakra]]** **<sup>E</sup>:** Sever one chakra bind per four caster levels; deal 1d6 + 1d6/essentia damage per bind severed.

**[[Unbinding (Spell)|Unbinding]]****:** Frees everyone in range from spells that constrain or bind.

**Undead Anatomy I:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium undead.

**Undead Anatomy II:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large undead.

**Undead Anatomy III:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge undead.

**[[Undead Bane Weapon (Spell)|Undead Bane Weapon]]****:** Weapon gains *undead bane* property and is considered good-aligned.

**[[Undead Eyes (Spell)|Undead Eyes]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Form a telepathic link with a mindless undead creature.

**[[Undead Lieutenant (Spell)|Undead Lieutenant]]****:** Chosen undead can give orders to undead in your control.

**[[Undead Mask (Spell)|Undead Mask]]****:** Subject's type changes to undead.

**[[Undead Torch (Spell)|Undead Torch]]****:** Undead creature gains blue aura that gives +2d6 damage against living creatures.

**[[Undeath to Death (Spell)|Undeath to Death]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Destroys 1d4 HD/level undead (max. 20d4).

**[[Undeath's Eternal Foe (Spell)|Undeath’s Eternal Foe]]****:** Subjects receive negative energy protection and immunity to most undead special attacks.

**[[Under the Skin (Spell)|Under the Skin]]:** Implants a small object beneath the skin of a target.

**[[Undermaster (Spell)|Undermaster]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain earth-related spell-like abilities.

**[[Undersong (Spell)|Undersong]]****:** Make [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks instead of Concentration checks.

**[[Undetectable Alignment (Spell)|Undetectable Alignment]]****:** Conceals alignment for 24 hours.

**[[Undo (Spell)|Undo]]****:** You reverse one effect.

**[[Undying Aura (Spell)|Undying Aura]]****:** Subject gains immunity to death effects, energy drain, and negative energy; can harm one undead or heal one deathless.

**[[Undying Vigor of the Dragonlords (Spell)|Undying Vigor of the Dragonlords]]** **<sup>A</sup>:** Heal yourself of 5d6 or more points of damage. *Sorcerer spell only.*

**[[Unearthly Beauty (Spell)|Unearthly Beauty]]****:** As *[[Blinding Beauty (Spell)|blinding beauty]]*, but creatures must save or die.

**[[Unearthly Heat (Spell)|Unearthly Heat]]****:** Target is subjected to unearthly heat for 1 round/level.

**Unerring Weapon:** Grants a +2 bonus, +1 per four caster levels, on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.

**[[Unfailing Terrain (Spell)|Unfailing Terrain]]****:** Smooth difficult terrain.

**[[Unfazed (Spell)|Unfazed]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Cannot suffer from a number of conditions, easier to cast spells after being injured.

**[[Unfazed, Lesser (Spell)|Unfazed, Lesser]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain temporary immunity from a chosen condition.

**[[Unfetter (Spell)|Unfetter]]****:** Remove distance restriction on eidolon.

**[[Unfettered Grasp (Spell)|Unfettered Grasp]]****:** Grappling creature immediately gains free attempt to escape.

**[[Unfettered Heroism (Spell)|Unfettered Heroism]]****:** Spend more than one action point per round plus gain one free action point per round.

**[[Unhallow (Spell)|Unhallow]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Designates location as unholy.

**[[Unhand (Spell)|Unhand]]****:** Disarms target.

**[[Unheavened (Spell)|Unheavened]]****:** Subject gains +4 save bonus against powers of good outsiders.

**[[Unholy Aura (Spell)|Unholy Aura]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against good spells.

**[[Unholy Beast (Spell)|Unholy Beast]]****:** Target animal transforms into an unholy minion under your control.

**[[Unholy Blight (Spell)|Unholy Blight]]****:** Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

**[[Unholy Ice Weapon (Spell)|Unholy Ice Weapon]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Create a masterwork weapon made of frozen unholy water.

**[[Unholy Storm (Spell)|Unholy Storm]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Evil-aligned rain falls in 20-ft. radius.

**Unholy Sword:** Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage vs. good.

**[[Unicorn Arrow (Spell)|Unicorn Arrow]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** 1d8+8 damage and [[Bull Rush|bull rush]]; +1 unicorn arrow/3 levels beyond 5th.

**[[Unicorn Blood (Spell)|Unicorn Blood]]****:** Gain immunity to poison, compulsion, charm effects; bestow temporary hp once.

**[[Unicorn Heart (Spell)|Unicorn Heart]]****:** Gain speed 60 ft., +4 on Str-, Dex-, and Con-based checks; use *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]* once.

**[[Unicorn Horn (Spell)|Unicorn Horn]]****:** You grow a horn that functions as a natural weapon.

**[[Unity Wine (Spell)|Unity Wine]]****:** Infuse up to 1 pint of wine in a single container with energy.

**[[Universal Formula (Spell)|Universal Formula]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Acts as any extract 3rd level or lower.

**[[Unliving Rage (Spell)|Unliving Rage]]****:** As *[[Rage (Spell)|rage]]*, except affecting only undead.

**[[Unliving Weapon (Spell)|Unliving Weapon]]****:** Undead subject explodes for 1d6 damage/2 levels when struck or at a specific time.

**[[Unluck (Spell)|Unluck]]****:** Subject remakes all rolls, uses worse result for 1 round/level.

**[[Unmovable Object (Spell)|Unmovable Object]]****:** Gain +2 Str, +4 Con, and bonuses to prevent being moved against your will.

**Unnatural Lust:** Target is compelled to kiss or caress another.

**[[Unnerving Gaze (Spell)|Unnerving Gaze]]****:** Subject takes –1 penalty on attacks for 1d3 rounds.

**Unprepared Combatant:** Target takes –4 on initiative and Reflex saves.

**[[Unseen Army (Spell)|Unseen Army]]****:** As *[[Spiritual Weapon (Spell)|spiritual weapon]]* but caster gets 1/level.

**[[Unseen Crafter (Spell)|Unseen Crafter]]****:** Invisible force obeys your command and can use the [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill.

**[[Unseen Crew (Spell)|Unseen Crew]]****:** Invisible force performs the duties of one crew member on a vessel; caster gets 1 unseen crew/level.

**[[Unseen Entourage (Spell)|Unseen Entourage]]****:** As *[[Improved Unseen Servant (Spell)|improved unseen servant]]* but caster gets 1 servant/level.

**[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|Unseen Servant]]****:** Invisible force obeys your commands.

**[[Unseen Servant, Mass (Spell)|Unseen Servant, Mass]]****:** As *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]* except creates one servant/level.

**[[Unseen Strike (Spell)|Unseen Strike]]****:** Invisibility effect triggered to activate the instant you successfully attack someone.

**[[Unshape Soulmeld (Spell)|Unshape Soulmeld]]****:** One of target’s soulmelds is destroyed.

**[[Unwilling Shield (Spell)|Unwilling Shield]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Subject shares wounds you receive.

**[[Unwitting Ally (Spell)|Unwitting Ally]]****:** Subject is considered ally for 1 round.

**[[Unyielding Form of Inevitable Death (Spell)|Unyielding Form of Inevitable Death]]****:** You take the form of a [[Inevitable, Marut (Bestiary 2 PF1)|marut]].

**[[Unyielding Roots (Spell)|Unyielding Roots]]****:** Creature grows roots that keep it stationary and heal it every round.

## Up-Ut
**[[Updraft (Spell)|Updraft]]:** Column of wind lifts you aloft.

**[[Urban Shield (Spell)|Urban Shield]]:** City grants cover to you, not to enemies.

**[[Urchin's Spines (Spell)|Urchin’s Spines]]:** Target grows spines that damage opponents.

**Utter Contempt:** Target’s attitude worsens by two categories.

**[[Utterdark (Spell)|Utterdark]]:** 100-ft./level radius of darkness that evil creatures can see through.
